item.description: The important thing here is that the historical data is needed to properly understand the context of new ICU admissions. Data should ideally be provided daily though the province's Open Data team, @ONDigital, the same way the less useful ICU inventory is provided.

item.title: #en @ 1467777925583831044
item.description:
We all benefit from #opendata.
Even #opendata takes effort & money to produce.
The fact that it then goes on to benefit *all of us* doesn't mean it's worth less: it means we should invest more in producing #opendata /because/ it takes money & effort - and benefits us all! https://t.co/zGyPs4nzR4

item.description:
Some people in the comments understood my tweet as a complaint. I'm not complaining at all!
I'm all for open data.
It is great if others find ways to make our work more valuable for the world.
